comments:
200412070800

In the ant editor I did a copy on the last target in my file followed
immediately by a paste.  A dialog appeared saying a / 0 error occurred.  After
this, copy and paste no longer do anything in the editor despite being enabled.
 This happens consistantly with any copy/paste operation in the ant editor.

From the changes in bug 79788 to use a combined preference store for the Ant 
editor. The AntAutoEditStrategy was not updated to use the correct store 
resulting in the pref not being defined and returning zero as the default-
default.
Kevin, please verify the changes to the AntAutoEditStrategy.
